basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Stanislav Temelkov. I am a student who seeks development and does everything to achieve his goals. I would say that I am slightly different from the others, but not in the negative. I have participated in the integration of blockchain (Cardano, Cronos, Ravencoin, etc.) to the American platform Cryptoslam. Creating online stores, maintenance, blogging, promoting and advertising web pages and social networks, and many other interesting projects. I have professional experience with Scrum-organized projects through JIRA, TRELLO and etc., AWS clusters, lambda, SQS, SNS, ECS, CloudFormation, EC2 and etc., .NET Framework, ASP.NET MVC, and Web API. I also have a cursory glance with Laravel and Angular. I will do my best to be pleased with myself and I'm sure it will happen. Although I am still a student, I like the profession I study for and want to work in it. I am a fan of remote work(such as there may be business trips or team building) as I think this model of work gives many opportunities for me and employers.

projects.title: School Website
projects.description: This is the first project I tackled during a whole summer vacation. Everything happened slowly and unprofessionally, but this is where my interest started after I saw that I was able to recreate what was in my head.

projects.title: ITNEWSBG (WEBSITE)
projects.description: The ITNEWSBG website is part of my curiosity and drive to learn something new. The site was made with the goal of having a stream of information that I could provide to fans of IT news on the Internet.

projects.title: ITNEWSBG (APP)
projects.description: This mobile app was rewritten because of my passion to learn new things. My goal was not only to make my first mobile app, but also to add a new way to visit the website as well :)

projects.title: Company website
projects.description: This project was an order from the company Integrasek OOD, whose requirements were met to the letter in accordance with the goals of the project and the color range of the graphic designer. Every single part of the project was created by me including hosting, emails, etc.

projects.title: BLOG/SHOP WEBSITE
projects.description: The project was implemented according to the client's requirements, and later more functionalities and a catalog with a store were added.

projects.title: RELAX IN VARNA
projects.description: I participate in this project by accepting it ready and continue to maintain and develop it together with the owner of the site.
